Data.text_description:
The probability of stress level being high (A=1) is 0.7837. 
For those with stress level being low (A=0), the probability of job satisfaction being high (B=1) is 0.7364. 
For those with stress level being high (A=1), the probability of job satisfaction being high (B=1) is 0.3383. 
For those with stress level being low (A=0), the probability of appearance being high (C=1) is 0.6508. 
For those with stress level being high (A=1), the probability of appearance being high (C=1) is 0.6525. 
For those with stress level being low (A=0), the probability of traffic congestion being high (D=1) is 0.6287. 
For those with stress level being high (A=1), the probability of traffic congestion being high (D=1) is 0.6200.
